name: Bas
description:
WEB VERSION DOES NOT WORK IN FIREFOX

Entry for Ludum Dare 52 HARVEST

Play as Bas (Bastian) and harvest, and plant various seeds to get to the exit.

Arrow keys for movement, Z to jump, X to plant, and A, S (or Q, W, thanks Mint) to switch between seed types or C to scroll through. If you get stuck Escape will reset the level.

Controller support - left stick or dpad for movement, B for jump A for plan, and shoulder buttons to select seeds - hit Start to reset the level.

Assets modified from @Kenney https://kenney.itch.io/
